name: Ape Escape On the Move!
description:
Ape Escape On the Move! is an arcade game developed by SCE Japan Studio. It was originally released in 2011. It was published by Sony Computer Entertainment. Ape Escape On the Move! has a Metascore of 43, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Ape Escape On the Move! is available on PlayStation 3.
